channel.title: Lukas Ott on Community Over Code Europe
channel.description: Recent content in Lukas Ott on Community Over Code Europe

item.title: State of the Civet
item.description: An update on what’s happened inside the Apache PLC4X over the last year. What we have achieved and what we are planning on doing for the near and not-so-near future. From new protocols, updated APIs, new languages, GUI applications right up to even more supported languages and fully generated driver implementations.
